name: Space Apes!
description:
Space Apes!  The game to fulfill your dreams of becoming a space dude dodging bananas while shooting an invincible monkey (its about time, right?)!

Before you get skeptical, you have no idea how cool this game makes you. The second you press the start button, coolness energy flows from whatever your playing it on through your fingertips (we recommend washing hands after that happens). Our studies show that the people who have played "Space Apes" are 100% less likely to have been struck by lightning in 1972! Plus, none of the people who have rated it highly or donated were killed by car crashes in 2007. Don't risk it: play, like, and (maybe) donate! But only if you have money. We don't want to be the jerks responsible for your debt.

Controls: Mobile: tap the left/right side of the screen to move to the left/right press the bullet button to shoot PC: A/D or arrow keys to move left/right space to shoot  Please report any bugs in the  \/ comments \/
